question: What is an HTML Document?

A file containing content to display on a webpage, written in HTML
A type of CSS file for styling webpages
A programming script that runs in the background

options: A tag that does not require attributes
A tag that only works in CSS
A tag that does not require a closing tag
A tag used to delete content

question: Why should we use JavaScript?
options: To structure the content of a webpage
To add interactivity and dynamic behavior to webpages
To add styling to a webpage

question: Why should we use CSS?
options: To style and layout the webpage content

question: What is the difference between a tag and an element in HTML?
options: A tag is part of the code, and an element includes both the tag and its content
A tag is used to style elements, and an element is used to display content
A tag is always self-closing, and an element is not

options: To display the title and metadata of the webpage
To structure the body content of the page
To insert JavaScript into the page
To load images on the page
